name: Gecko
description: Howdy! Looking for a fun and competitive party game to challenge your friends to?!  Well look no further! Gecko is a simple and quick 'retro' game of survival of the fittest! Win a round -  Get a point... First to 5 points wins! Simple!  Buckle up and enjoy, for less then the price of jar of pickled eggs! See you on the road partner!
